The user gathers [[sand]] and rock into their fist to form stone-made weapons, like a [[wikipedia:mallet|mallet]] or a [[wikipedia:shield|shield]]. Its hardness is so great, that it can withstand the might of [[Chōji Akimichi]]'s [[Partial Multi-Size Technique|enhanced fist]].
